name: WC Coupons by Country
author: AxisThemes

sections.description:
Adds country usage restriction to WooCommerce Coupon

This plugin adds usage restriction to specific countries in WooCommerce coupons by customer‚Äôs billing or shipping country.

Please notice that WooCommerce must be installed and active.

Installation

Check out our installation guide and configuration of WC Coupons by Country tab Installation.

Questions?

You can answer your questions using:

  • Our Session FAQ.
  • Creating a topic in the WordPress support forum (English only).

Contribute

You can contribute to the source code in our GitHub page.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.0 or greater.
  • WooCommerce 2.3 or greater.

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don‚Äôt need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of WC Coupons by Country, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type ‚ÄúWC Coupons by Country‚Äù and click Search Plugins. Once you‚Äôve found our coupon usage restriction plugin you can view details about it such as the the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking ‚ÄúInstall Now‚Äù.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our ‚ÄúWC Coupons by Country‚Äù plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
What is the plugin license?

  • This plugin is released under a GPL license.

What is needed to use this plugin?

  • WordPress 4.0 or later.
  • WooCommerce 2.3 or later.

Where can I report bugs or contribute to the project?

Bugs can be reported either in our support forum or preferably on the WC Coupons by Country GitHub repository.

WC Coupons by Country is awesome! Can I contribute?

Yes you can! Join in on our GitHub repository üôÇ
